thread.title: Sheetal Massey's birthday getaway to the mountains with Vikrant Massey and son
thread.title_full: Sheetal Massey's birthday getaway to the mountains with Vikrant Massey and son

author: @mid_day
title: Sheetal Massey's birthday getaway to the mountains with Vikrant Massey and son
text:
Vikrant and Sheetal were seen enjoying the view of the majestic mountains as the sky lit up in hues of blue and yellow at sunset.
Sheetal shared a picture of corn stall along the streets, where a man is seen roasting Corn on the cob, while the customers soaked the warmth of the grill in the cool environment.
Vacations are incomplete without scrumptious meals. Sheetal shared an aesthetic picture of a delicious pizza placed on a table with fried as the sunrays peaked in.
Nothing beats a hot bowl of pahadon wali Maggie, especially when it's all cool all around. And if you have the view of snow-clad mountains, a picture like this is a must.
Sheetal holds her son close in this picture as they pose against the backdrop of mersmerising mountains and the sky.
Sharing an adorable moment, her two favourite boys, Vikrant and Vardaan, kiss the birthday girl.
Mumma dearest holds Vardaan in her arms as they pose for a picture, while Vikrant captures the beautiful and post-card worthy frame.
Acing the winter look with a long black overcoat with a white t-shirt and blue jeans, Sheetal poses along the streets.
The family poses for a picture, flashing their brightest and warmest smiles while dressed in winter outfits to beat the chill.
Sheetal adorably watches her son as he playfully enjoys running around dressed in an orange t-shirt, jeans and white sneakers.
Sheetal soaks in the warmth of the sun in the hills surrounded by lush trees and colourful flowers in this picture.
ADVERTISEMENT
